mapper.select: select sfc.SITE, sfc.PRODUCT_LINE_BO, sfc.WORK_SHOP_BO, sfc.STATION_BO, sfc.OPERATION_BO, sfc.STATE, ps.START_DATE, ps.END_DATE, mso.SHOP_ORDER, mso.ORDER_QTY, mso.PLAN_END_DATE, mso.PLAN_START_DATE, ps.SCHEDULE_NO, ps.QUANTITY from me_sfc sfc left join m_shop_order mso on sfc.SHOP_ORDER_BO=mso.BO left join p_schedule ps on ps.BO=sfc.SCHEDULE_BO where sfc.sfc=#{sn}

SELECT i.ITEM AS item, bc.QTY AS qty, i.VERSION AS version, o.OPERATION AS operation, bc.COMPONENT_POSITION AS position, bc.ZS_TYPE AS zsType FROM me_sfc s LEFT JOIN m_bom_componnet bc ON s.BOM_BO = bc.BOM_BO LEFT JOIN m_operation o ON bc.OPERATION_BO = o.BO LEFT JOIN m_item i ON bc.COMPONENT_BO = i.BO -- TODO:连接codeRule WHERE bc.BOM_BO = s.BOM_BO AND s.SFC = #{sn}

select ps.SCHEDULE_NO as SCHEDULE, ps.QUANTITY, ms.ITEM_BO, ms.DEVICE_BO, ms.INPUT_QTY, ms.SFC_QTY, ms.DONE_QTY, ms.SCRAP_QTY from me_sfc ms join p_schedule ps on ps.bo=ms.SCHEDULE_BO where ms.bo=#{bo}

SELECT mso.SHOP_ORDER AS shopOrder, mso.ORDER_QTY AS orderQty, mi.ITEM AS item, ps.SCHEDULE_NO AS scheduleNo, mpl.PRODUCT_LINE AS productLine, ps.QUANTITY AS scheduleQty, ps.START_DATE AS startDate, ps.END_DATE AS endDate, ps.STATE AS scheduleState FROM me_sfc ms LEFT JOIN m_shop_order mso ON ms.SHOP_ORDER_BO = mso.BO LEFT JOIN m_item mi ON ms.ITEM_BO = mi.BO LEFT JOIN p_schedule ps ON ms.SCHEDULE_BO = ps.BO LEFT JOIN m_product_line mpl ON ms.PRODUCT_LINE_BO = mpl.BO WHERE ms.SFC = #{sn}

SELECT mr.ROUTER_NAME AS routerName, mr.VERSION AS routerVersion, mr.STATE AS routerState, mo.OPERATION_NAME AS currentOperation, ms.STATE AS currentOperationState FROM me_sfc ms LEFT JOIN m_router mr on ms.SFC_ROUTER_BO = mr.BO LEFT JOIN m_operation mo on ms.OPERATION_BO = mo.BO WHERE ms.SFC = #{sn}

select msa.ASSY_USER, msa.ASSY_TIME, msa.COMPONENET_BO, msa.ASSEMBLED_SN, msa.QTY, mi.ITEM_TYPE, mswl.STATION_BO from me_sfc_assy msa left join m_item mi on mi.bo=msa.COMPONENET_BO left join me_sfc_wip_log mswl on mswl.BO=msa.WIP_LOG_BO where msa.SFC=#{sn}

select mswl.STATION_BO, mswl.STATE, mnc.NC_CODE, mnc.NC_DESC, mitem.ITEM, mbc.COMPONENT_POSITION, mswl.CREATE_DATE, mswl.USER_BO, msnl.REMARK from me_sfc_nc_log msnl LEFT JOIN me_sfc_wip_log mswl ON msnl.WIP_LOG_BO=mswl.BO LEFT JOIN m_nc_code mnc ON msnl.NC_CODE_BO=mnc.BO LEFT JOIN m_item mitem ON mitem.BO=mswl.ITEM_BO LEFT JOIN m_bom_componnet mbc ON mbc.BOM_BO=mswl.BOM_BO and mbc.COMPONENT_BO=msnl.COMPONENT_BO
mswl.SFC=#{sn}

SELECT mswl.STATION_BO as station, mswl.STATE as state, mitem.ITEM as item, mswl.CREATE_DATE as createDate, mswl.USER_BO as userBo FROM me_sfc mesfc LEFT JOIN me_sfc_wip_log mswl ON mesfc.SFC= mswl.SFC AND mswl.STATE='已检查' LEFT JOIN m_item mitem ON mitem.BO= mesfc.ITEM_BO
mesfc.SFC=#{sn}

select mswl.STATION_BO AS repairStation, msnl.STATION_BO AS badStation, msr.REPAIR_METHOD, msr.REPAIR_REASON, msr.REMARK, msr.DUTY_UNIT, msr.REPLACE_ITEM_BO, msr.REPLACE_ITEM_SN, mswl.CREATE_DATE from me_sfc_repair msr JOIN me_sfc_wip_log mswl ON mswl.BO=msr.WIP_LOG_BO JOIN me_sfc_nc_log msnl ON msnl.BO=msr.NG_LOG_BO JOIN m_item mitem ON mitem.BO=mswl.ITEM_BO
mswl.SFC=#{sn}
